name: subnegd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Relationship between subtraction and negative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
